block.createfisheryindustry.frame_trap.t: Captures nearby fish, or other small creatures, and items along the path. Also gains fishing loot from the current biome over time. Grants experience nuggets when fishing triggers or creatures are captured.
block.createfisheryindustry.mechanical_p: Processes peeling recipes, similar to a mechanical saw. Can shear sheep or harvest scutes from turtles and armadillos. Can strip bark from entire trees, remove rust and wax from blocks, and harvest mature amethyst clusters.
A mechanical component for processing peeling recipes and interacting with certain entities
block.createfisheryindustry.mesh_trap.to: Capture specified entity, gain its loot and experience nuggets.
Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
Automatically collects nearby items, captures fish or other small creatures, and stores them. Note that the mesh trap does not have the ability to obtain fishing loot.
block.createfisheryindustry.smart_beehiv: Test block, the functions are still under development. This block is not part of the content of this mod 'Create: Fishery Industry'. It will be released in the upcoming new mod 'Create: Dinner' in the future. Stay tuned.
block.createfisheryindustry.smart_mesh.t: Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
Smart Mesh automatically collects nearby items and stores them.
block.createfisheryindustry.smart_nozzle: Automatically collects nearby items matching the filter and stores them. Air flow only affects filtered items.
Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
Place an item in the filter slot to collect only that type of item. Air flow will ignore non-matching items completely.
When attached to an encased fan:
Smart Nozzle with filter capability that can automatically collect nearby items matching the filter criteria.
Automatically collects nearby items, captures fish, or other small creatures, and stores them
Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
When attached to an encased fan:
Attach to the front of an Encased Fan to distribute its effect on Entities in all directions.
create_fishery.harpoon.tooltip: Can be used with Pneumatic Harpoon Gun
create_fishery.harpoon.tooltip.sneak: Sneak + Right Click: Only shoot at entities
create_fishery.pneumatic_harpoon_gun.mus: Must aim at entity while sneaking
Frame Traps will attach themselves to moving contraptions
Whenever Frame Traps are moved as part of an animated Contraption...
...they will collect items and capture small creatures in their path
Collected items are automatically stored in attached inventories
createfisheryindustry.ponder.frame_trap_: When Frame Traps move underwater as part of a Contraption...
...they have a chance to obtain fishing loot over time
Experience orbs are generated alongside the loot
createfisheryindustry.ponder.mechanical_: Processing Items with the Mechanical Peeler
Upward facing Mechanical Peelers can process a variety of items
The processed item always moves against the rotational input to the peeler
Byproducts are stored internally and can be extracted using automation
Whenever Peelers are moved as part of an animated Contraption...
...they will process any blocks the contraption runs them into
Stripping and Harvesting with the Mechanical Peeler
When given Rotational Force, a Mechanical Peeler will strip bark from logs directly in front of it
Mechanical Peelers can also interact with entities to harvest resources
They can harvest amethyst clusters and remove oxidation from copper blocks
createfisheryindustry.ponder.mesh_trap.t: Right-Click small creatures while holding a Mesh Trap to capture them
Capturing creatures yields their drops and Experience Nuggets
When placed, Mesh Traps automatically collect nearby items and capture creatures
Right-Click to extract stored items manually
Adjacent inventories will receive items automatically
item.createfisheryindustry.copper_diving: The wearer gains super jump ability in water, up to four blocks high, with no fall damage upon landing.
Copper Diving Leggings used with diving boots to experience a moonwalk-like feeling underwater.
item.createfisheryindustry.harpoon_pouch: Holds up to 4 harpoons. Automatically replenishes a harpoon to the main hand after throwing and prioritizes storing picked-up harpoons in the pouch.
item.createfisheryindustry.netherite_div: The wearer gains sprint and super jump ability in water or lava, up to four blocks high, with no fall damage upon landing.
Netherite Diving Leggings used with diving boots to experience a moonwalk-like feeling underwater or in lava seas.
item.createfisheryindustry.pneumatic_har: Shoots harpoon, right click again to draws it back
Powered by compressed air. Shoots a harpoon that pulls hit entities toward you or pulls you toward blocks. Can remotely collect items.
item.createfisheryindustry.waxed_cardboa: Test item. It will be released in the upcoming new mod 'Create: Over the Sea' in the future. Stay tuned.
An ancient, worn harpoon lost in the depths; polish it to restore its former gloss
